scripts.browser-test: echo running browser tests... && echo no browser test
scripts.source-test: echo running source tests... &&  echo no source test
scripts.publish: npm -s run lint+build+test && echo please publish to typings/registry
scripts.build+test: npm run build && npm run all-tests
scripts.lint+build+test: npm run lint && npm run build+test
scripts.prepare: echo Starting preparing... && npm run prepare-1.6.0 & npm run prepare-2.0.0-alpha && echo Prepare completed.
scripts.prepare-1.6.0: echo Installing typings in 1.6.0... && cd 1.6.0 && typings install
scripts.prepare-2.0.0-alpha: echo Installing typings in 2.0.0-alpha... && cd 2.0.0-alpha && typings install
scripts.build-ts: echo Starting building... &&  npm run build-ts-1.6.0 & npm run build-ts-2.0.0-alpha && echo Build typescript completed.
scripts.bundle: echo Starting bundling... && npm run bundle-1.6.0 & npm run bundle-2.0.0-alpha
scripts.bundle-1.6.0: echo Bundling typings in 1.6.0... && cd 1.6.0 && typings bundle -o out/index.d.ts
scripts.bundle-2.0.0-alpha: echo Bundling typings in 2.0.0-alpha... && cd 2.0.0-alpha && typings bundle -o out/index.d.ts
scripts.test: echo Starting tests... && npm run test-1.6.0 & npm run test-2.0.0-alpha
scripts.test-1.6.0: echo Runing test in 1.6.0... && tsc -p 1.6.0/test && echo Test in 1.6.0 successfully completed.
scripts.test-2.0.0-alpha: echo Runing test in 2.0.0-alpha... && tsc -p 2.0.0-alpha/test && echo Test in 2.0.0-alpha successfully completed.
scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run bundle
